entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
